name: 基礎油畫（二）
description: 培養學生具備油畫的歷史發展認知，與油畫媒材、基礎技法表現。
syllabus:
**課程介紹** **(Course Description)**:

使一年級新生能熟悉油畫媒材, 並能了解各種表現技法與技法背後所闡述之精神, 進而刺激進階創作思想.

For first level of undergraduate students, to learn how to manage the oil paints or other related materials is very crucial. Then to inspire them to further step.

**課程進度** **(Weekly Schedule)**:

1\. 課程概述與油彩繪畫之基本概念

    Course Instruction, the basic idea of oil painting

2\. 色彩訓練 (A)

    Colour strategy (A)

3\. 色彩訓練( B)

    Colour strategy (B)

4\. 課堂習作與批評( A)

    Studio practice and group critic (A)

5\. 課堂習作與批評 (B)

    Studio practice and group critic (B)

6\. 色彩與造型

    Colour and style

7\. 靜物與油畫創作 (A)

    Still life (A)

8\. 靜物與油畫創作 (B)

    Still life (B)

9\. 靜物與油畫創作 (C)

    Still life (C)

10\. 期中作品評論與意見交換

      Group critic (Midterm)

11\. 風景寫生 (A)

      Landscape (A)

12\. 風景寫生 (B)

      Landscape (B)

13\. 作品評論與意見交換

      Group critic

14\. 油畫媒材之於個人創作之關係

      Personal panguage and materials

15\. 油畫創作( A)

      Studio practice (A)

16\. 油畫創作 (B)

      Studio practice (B)

17\. 油畫創作 (C)

      Studio practice (C)

18\. 期末作品評鑑

      Group critic (Final)
